verses.roman:
'haraye namaḥ, kṛṣṇa yādavāya namaḥ
gopāla govinda rāma śrī-madhusūdana'

synonyms: haraye namaḥ—I offer my respectful obeisances to Lord Hari; kṛṣṇa—O Kṛṣṇa; yādavāya—unto the descendant of the Yadu dynasty; namaḥ—all obeisances; gopāla—of the name Gopāla; govinda—of the name Govinda; rāma—of the name Rāma; śrī-madhusūdana—of the name Śrī Madhusūdana.
translation: [All the devotees sang this popular song along with the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra.] "Haraye namaḥ, kṛṣṇa yādavāya namaḥ gopāla govinda rāma śrī-madhusūdana."
